reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan soft, thick, and warm, with one noting it's perfect for cold months.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars CUTE, VIBRANT, COMFY
items.body: This is such a cute and comfy sweater to put over ANYTHING! I went ahead and sized up for that “oversized” look, but I think I could’ve definitely gone for my normal! Super comfy, perfect length, and very soft overall with great quality fabric. I even ACCIDENTALLY washed it and then dried it! But it didn’t shrink at all, and it didn’t dye any other items!! I really like it and I’ve already gotten so many people to ask for the link! Read more
items.author: Kaylan Mitchell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful color and Weight
items.body: This sweater is great. I did a small at 5’ and 140 pounds. The color is what was shown and it is nice and thick and just the right amount of heavy. I have had it a few weeks now and there is no pilling. Would definitely buy again. Read more
items.author: Amy

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Looks cute but isn't very wearable!
items.body: This has a cute design and a nice color but it isn't very wearable. I wore it just around the house while getting ready and it started to get fuzzy and pull apart/ pill. I need something a bit more durable especially with 2 little ones at home! Read more
items.author: Brie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft cozy staples
items.body: Ordered blue and red. Navy is shorter and more fitted while the red in the same size fits much larger. I ordered medium In both and could probably size down to a small in the red. Both still super cute and soft. Red didnt come vacuum sealed like the blue one which makes me think it was a return. It does have a bit more pilling and some pulls on the threads but i want to wear it so i wont be returning as of now. We will see how it wears. Read more
items.author: heathermes

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cardigan Sweater
items.body: This cardigan exceeded my expectations in every way. The fabric is soft, lightweight, and comfortable, making it perfect for year-round wear. The fit is true to size and very flattering, with just the right balance of relaxed and polished. It layers beautifully over tees or blouses, and the quality stitching ensures it holds up well after multiple washes. A versatile, timeless piece that can be dressed up for the office or worn casually at home. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Missy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Oversized, soft and dreamy
items.body: Love how soft and cozy this sweater is. Ordered XL, I am 185 lbs and 5’4. The XL is perfectly oversized and roomie for me. Just how I like it. Read more
items.author: Amanda Cagle

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the purchase!
items.body: Don’t buy! Very soft but wore one time and have many pulls after one hour of wear! So infuriating! Read more
items.author: A

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Very soft but will appear old and worn out after first wear
items.body: The sweater is super soft, but it arrived used in and already exhibiting snagged/loose knit. It continued to snag immediately despite my not doing anything at all. I would be very afraid to machine wash (as tag indicates is okay), because I imagine it'd surely get snagged on just about any other piece of clothing. Read more
items.author: AmLu

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Gold, Blue, Burgundy, Apricot, Black, Red, Navy, Khaki, Pink, Greygreen, Purple, Yellow, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
